title: Old legendary skins VU?
body:
Hi Riot please dont remove my thread, i just want to know, if there is any chance that my old legendary skins will get a VU soon? I Mean according to your own legendary skin standard point of view: Werent they supposed to be reduced to 1350 or 975 rp?


I just wanted to have them the quality of a today 1820rp skin.

Please dont understand my request as miscelaneous one...

Cheers. and {{champion:36}}  {{champion:23}}  {{champion:31}}  {{champion:2}}  they will all be very grateful!

replies.body: {{champion:50}}  need his legendary out asap.

i'll take 10

also, lets not forget {{champion:82}}
that's an Ultimate not Legendary.
{{champion:8}} this guy needs a VU on his legendary, orrrr a price reduc. I'd much prefer a VU. Soul Stealer is basically as legendary as blood lord just w/o the VO's
For particles, they could give it a more "tainted" look by making some of it darker as though the blood is corrupted. That's just my idea :V

http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/portrait/vladimir-blood-lord.jpg

That's how it's supposed to look like, it looks nothing like that in-game.
I know that. But if you want the particles to be different, it's kinda hard to do that with blood. Again, I said nothing about the in-game model. I said "particles"
{{champion:8}} legendary skin needs to look as threatening and buffed on his splash art lol, in-game it doesn't look much legendary.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosDK,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZxiTWv0f,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-01-10T09:15:43.148+0000)
>
> {{champion:8}} legendary skin needs to look as threatening and buffed on his splash art lol, in-game it doesn't look much legendary.

The only reason I would buy that skin is because of the new quotes. I'm always fond of the "Kneel befor Vlad" quote, imagening something like Tyrant Swain and Creator Viktor, but his bloodlord just make me feel like he's some kind of Darius and Garen alike and doesn't really give me a feeling of fragile,intellegent, dominant and superior like his classic skin gives.
Also {{champion:1}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:4}}
Heimer just got a HUGE visual REWORK, he needs nothing now

His legendary skin is at the same level as all of the rest now. 

Far as I know it has no unique audio. All of the skins share the same type of unique animations. Although I believe the under 925 skins have the same rockets. 

Only reason I haven't given some serious though into returning it is that I like the theme. And hope they make it worthy of being called Legendary. 

That or they'll just reduce the price and I'll get some RP back.
Too bad, it's a Legacy skin. Those will never have their prices changed (they've already said that).
But I'm pretty sure they can go on sale now so I guess that's a little better?
Yeah they do still go on sale every once in awhile.

> [{quoted}](name=Y0UB133DR3D,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZxiTWv0f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T20:12:56.853+0000)
>
> Also {{champion:1}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:4}}

Yeah!
No mention of Tris? That firegirl skin could look amazing, if it didn't very specifically NOT look amazing.
I hope they just give them a VU. I don't want a price reduction I want a Legendary to look like a Legendary. Just a side project where they do some work on the Legendary skins.

Supposedly, Mundo is one of the top priorities (maybe out of 10-15) for a VU, so maybe within a few months I will be able to appreciate his legendary skin. Cho'gath however, is in need of some fixing, but will not be getting a Vu before people like {{champion:78}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:44}} etc. Let's face it, pizza feet is a problem.

Bloodlord {{champion:8}}  needs to be updated too, it doesn't look like how it is shown on his splash art. The way he looks on the art looks so threatening, but in-game it looks just like {{champion:8}} recolored.
They will eventually, or get a price reduction.
